title: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore + 31 DLCs
body:
MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore + 31 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Racing, Sports, 3D, ATV, Motorcycles
Companies: Rainbow Studios, Nordic Games, Nordic Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 11.3 GB
Repack Size: from 1.9 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MEGA.nz + MirrorCreator (Uploaded by Smith, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on MX.vs.ATV.Supercross.Encore.2017.Official.Supercross.Pack-CODEX ISO release: codex-mx.vs.atv.supercross.encore.2017.official.supercross.pack.iso (12,171,051,008 bytes)
  • All 32 released DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of tutorial videos for French, Spanish, Italian and German localizations
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.3 to 1.9~2.4 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-25 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 16 GB (~19 GB during installation)
  • Game settings can be changed via icon, created on desktop or by running “MXSettings.exe” in game folder
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911

Game Description

Rip, jump, and scrub your way on over 30 tracks and try to cross the finish line first against more than 60 official riders to attain all that motocross glory. Choose between bikes or ATVs, multiple game modes including Career, Single races, Free Ride, and online multiplayer events with up to 12 players. Perform amazing tricks to impress your fans or just “whip” over jumps to finish the race first. Customize your rider with items from more than 80 licensed motocross companies and kick up dirt and dust on your way to victory.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous repack of this game.
